resources.string: Delete this attitune from your list
Please use Menu > Options to configure TuxDroid IP and PORT
Can\'t contact server, check your IP or your data connection
Dongle is not connected, please connect it
Can\'t connect tux, check it\'s well turned on
IP or hostname of the tux\'s server
Port listen by tux server (270 on oldest tux server version and 54321 on newer version)
Use a fake tuxdroid to simulate you have a real tuxdroid
You are not connected to tux check parameters
Voice to use for TTS Tuxdroid engine

Welcome to TuxAndDroid !
This application will allow you to control your TuxDroid(see http://www.kysoh.com)

1. Use Menu > Option to configure IP (and port) of your own TuxDroid server.
For demo purpose you can also choose to use Emulator mode that simulate you are connected to a real TuxDroid

2. Come back to the main screen

3. You can now control your TuxDroid by doing gestures on his eyes, mouth and flippers.
